about_the_game:
Get all the juicy renders with Adria and the others AND help the development of our spicy games at the same time...

You will get:
  • All the sexy renders from the game
  • All the renders of the characters and poses used in the game
  • Good feeling of supporting a small indie studio!

How to access the files?
  • Right click on the game in Steam
  • Click Properties and Local Files tab
  • Click on Browse Local Files
  • You will see the folder called DLC and inside, you will find your reward!

Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. Some scenes contain violence, blood, and a modest amount of gore. 

The images also contains scenes of sexual assault and non-consensual sex, self-harm and suicide in the context of religious fanaticism and brainwashing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
